select * from (select rownum RNUM, zxcvb.* from ( SELECT g.g_no , g.c_no, g.manager_name, g.work_place, g.career, g.seeker_sex, g.seeker_age, g.salary, g.attendencetime, g.leaveworktime, g.graduation, to_char(g.gonggoreg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "gonggoreg_date", trunc(closedate-sysdate) as "due_date", g.content, g.opendate, g.closedate, c.name, i.business_industry, (SELECT NVL(TRIM(r.field_detail1), '') FROM role_detail r WHERE r.g_no = g.g_no AND ROWNUM = 1) as "field_detail1"
FROM gonggo g, company_mem c, company_info i where 1=1 and c.c_no=g.c_no and g.c_no=i.c_no
and ( upper(graduation) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(career) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(c.name) like upper('%${keyword}%') or EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM role_detail r WHERE r.g_no = g.g_no AND upper(r.field_detail1) like upper('%${keyword}%')) )
and( upper(i.business_industry) like upper('%${industry}%') )
and( upper(g.work_place) like upper('%${work_place}%') )
and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM role_detail r WHERE r.g_no = g.g_no AND ( upper(r.field_detail1) like upper('%${field_name}%') OR upper(r.field_detail2) like upper('%${field_name}%') OR upper(r.field_detail3) like upper('%${field_name}%') ) )
and ( trunc(closedate-sysdate) >= 0 )
and (
TRUNC(closedate-sysdate) < 0
)
order by ${sort} ,13 asc , gonggoreg_date ,business_industry asc ,work_place asc
) zxcvb) where RNUM >= #{begin_rowNo} and RNUM <= #{end_rowNo}
